conbody.p: is a software suite which retrieves the useful information from all systems and creates reports from this data. These reports of the systems give you better insights on how the systems and their data are being used.

For example, you can detect the periods of peak utilization of the systems and verify the corresponding performance statistics. Or you can identify the buckets with the largest number of files or highest used storage capacity.
Besides analyzes the ingested data and can correlate two events with each other.
The analysis of the data informs you of possible issues and gives you the opportunity to proactively intervene and avoid downtime of the systems.
